subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Connor McDavid is skilled but not yet strong, respected but innocent and naïve. He is only 16 but is widely considered the favorite to be chosen first in the 2015 N.H.L. entry draft.
snippet: Connor McDavid is skilled but not yet strong, respected but innocent and naïve. He is only 16 but is widely considered the favorite to be chosen first in the 2015 N.H.L. entry draft.
